identity.name: E1
identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Asymmetry over Symmetry.

project_context.target_audience: Coffee lovers, Tech enthusiasts, Design-conscious customers
user_constraints: Mix of warm and cool tones

visual_enhancers.contour_overlay: SVG background pattern simulating topographic lines

global.navigation: Floating Dock or Hamburger Menu (Top-Right or Bottom-Center)
global.responsive: Mobile-first. 3D scene creates 'room' feel on desktop, simplified 'object' view on mobile.

pages.Home: Hero 3D interactive scene. No scroll, just exploration.
pages.Menu: Glass overlay sliding from right. Grid layout for items.
pages.Contact: Minimalist form floating over the 3D floor.
pages.Download: Technical page. 'Export to WordPress' card with instructions.

buttons.secondary: border border-[#2A9D8F] text-[#2A9D8F] hover:bg-[#2A9D8F]/10 rounded-full px-6 py-2

core_principles: USE 'three' package directly. DO NOT install 'react-three-fiber' or '@react-three/drei'.
Initialize Scene, Camera, Renderer inside a useEffect hook.
Clean up resources (dispose geometries/materials) in useEffect cleanup return.

scene_setup.camera: PerspectiveCamera. FOV 75. Positioned to show the room depth.
scene_setup.lighting: AmbientLight (warm) + PointLights (cool/cyan) to create the 'Contour' mood.
scene_setup.objects: Simple geometric shapes representing tables/chairs if models unavailable. Use 'WireframeGeometry' or custom ShaderMaterial to achieve the contour line look.
scene_setup.interaction: Raycaster for click events. On click -> Open Info Popup (HTML Overlay).

performance: Disable anti-aliasing on mobile if needed for fps.

assets.icons: Lucide React (Menu, X, Download, Coffee, User, MapPin)

instructions_to_main_agent: 3. SHADCN: Use Shadcn UI for the 'Menu' (Cards), 'Contact' (Form), and 'Dialog' (Popups). Customize them to match the Dark/Teal theme.
4. ROUTING: Use React Router. The 3D background can stay mounted or re-mount per page. For simplicity, keep it as a background component in the Layout.
5. EXPORT: The 'Download' page should explain that the 'build' folder is the exportable asset.
6. CONTOUR THEME: Use CSS background patterns (SVG) for the 2D pages to maintain the theme.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for dark colors.
